text: Tiruvarur Collector M. Mathivanan, on the recommendation of Superintendent of Police Jeyachandran, has ordered detention of R. Rajesh (30) of Vadakadu, N. Vinodh (24), K. Saravanan (25) and P. Manoharan of Alangadu under the Goondas Act. They are part of the 10 member gang arrested and lodged in the Central Prisons, Tiruchi, in connection with the murder of Madhan (40) on November 25 last year. Madhan was the brother of AIADMK local leader Jagan of Koviloor.
title: Detained under Goondas Act
